attributes.action: Raise the current restriction of 40MPH on Two lane Roads for HGV`s to 50MPH.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: the reason for this petition is in the interest of road safety, the current 40mph restriction leads to frustration for Drivers of unresticted vehicles, who in turn atempt overtaking manoevers in totally un-suitable circumstances leading to MORE not LESS "accidents". A viable compromise would be to restrict these roads to 50mph for ALL vehicles. AND to police it PROPERLY.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
